DOC.brief_summary: To compare application site reactions after superficial and deep subcutaneous and intradermal injections of insulin detemir and saline in patients with diabetes - The patient serves as his own control, n=100 patients with diabetes
DOC.brief_title: Applications Site Reactions After Injection of Insulin Detemir and Saline in Subjects With Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Diabetes mellitus HbA1c<11 % BMI: 2035 kg/m2 Insulin detemir naive Basal insulin dose>20E Known allergy to study drug Current steroid or antiallergic treatment Lipodystrophy Change in insulin and antihypertensive treatment < 30 days Smokers or alcoholics
